title: Calories in Bud Light
meta_description: Discover calories in Bud Light per 12 oz serving, including carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations like different sizes.
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can or bottle of Bud Light lager beer, chilled, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand batch, serving size, and temperature; alcohol content affects values. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz serving of Bud Light has 110 kcal and 6.6 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Bud Light Platinum (higher ABV)
Pour into a 16 oz pint glass (larger serving)
Mix with diet soda for a shandy (half beer)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Bud Light?
What are the carbs in Bud Light?
faqs.a: 6.6 g carbohydrates per 12 oz, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Does Bud Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.9 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does Bud Light compare to regular Budweiser?
faqs.a: Bud Light has fewer calories (110 vs. 145) and carbs due to lower carbs and alcohol.

faqs.q: Calories in Bud Light per 100 ml?
faqs.a: Approximately 37 kcal per 100 ml, scaled from the 12 oz serving.
